metadata.feature_description: Searches and selects users and roles for permission assignment and sharing

steps.action: Navigated to Admin > Content > Assets and opened My Website folder
steps.expected: Assets panel opens showing folders and files
steps.actual: Assets panel opened showing folders (Badges, Groups, Images, etc.) and files

steps.action: Clicked on edit icon for Badges folder to open folder details
steps.expected: Folder details panel opens with Details and Permissions tabs
steps.actual: Folder details panel opened with DETAILS and PERMISSIONS tabs visible

steps.expected: Permissions tab shows role and user selection controls
steps.actual: Permissions tab displayed with Filter By Group dropdown, Select Role dropdown, permissions table, and Add User section

steps.action: Clicked on Select Role dropdown to view available roles
steps.expected: Dropdown displays list of available roles
steps.actual: Dropdown showed roles: Community Manager, Moderators, Subscribers, Test Custom Role, Translator (en-US), Unverified Users, Wiki Test Group

steps.action: Selected 'Moderators' role and clicked ADD button
steps.expected: Moderators role is added to the permissions table
steps.actual: Moderators role was added to the permissions table with View Folder permission checked by default. Role was removed from dropdown (no longer available for selection)

steps.action: Typed 'super' in the Add User search field
steps.actual: Autocomplete dropdown appeared showing 'SuperUser Account' with profile picture as a matching result

steps.action: Selected 'SuperUser Account' from autocomplete and clicked ADD button
steps.expected: User is added to the permissions table
steps.actual: SuperUser Account was added to a new USERS section in the permissions panel with View Folder permission checked and a Delete action available

observations: The Permissions tab is accessed by clicking the edit icon on a folder/file card, which opens a details panel with Details and Permissions tabs
Role selection uses dropdown menus with Filter By Group (All Roles, Global Roles) and Select Role options
User search uses a token-based autocomplete input that searches as you type
Once a role is added, it is removed from the available roles dropdown to prevent duplicates
Newly added roles and users have View Folder permission checked by default
Both roles and users can be removed using the Delete action in the Actions column
